bibl.title: A Quadrilingual Curiosity in the Bodleian Library in Oxford.
bibl.note: Preliminary publication of a shopping list, with entries in Greek, Latin and Demotic and an unidentified section. Provenance: Oxyrhynchus? (written in Alexandria or one of the Red Sea ports?), Nov.-Dec. 13 B.C. Will appear in the new catalogue of Bodleian Papyri.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology

bibl.seg: Coles Revel A., A Quadrilingual Curiosity in the Bodleian Library in Oxford.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 193-197, 1 fig.

Preliminary publication of a shopping list, with entries in Greek, Latin and Demotic and an unidentified section. Provenance: Oxyrhynchus? (written in Alexandria or one of the Red Sea ports?), Nov.-Dec. 13 B.C. Will appear in the new catalogue of Bodleian Papyri.
